verses.verse: Now the man<WH120> had<WH3045> relations<WH3045> with his wife<WH802> Eve,<WH2332> and she conceived<WH2029> and gave<WH3205> birth<WH3205> to Cain,<WH7014> and she said,<WH559> "I have gotten<WH7069> a manchild<WH376> with [the help of] the Lord.<WH3068>"

And again,<WH3254> she gave<WH3205> birth<WH3205> to his brother<WH251> Abel.<WH1893> And Abel<WH1893> was a keeper<WH7462> of flocks,<WH6629> but Cain<WH7014> was a tiller<WH5647> of the ground.<WH127>
So it came<WH1961> about in the course<WH4480> <WH7093> of time<WH3117> that Cain<WH7014> brought<WH935> an offering<WH4503> to the Lord<WH3068> of the fruit<WH6529> of the ground.<WH127>

And Abel,<WH1893> on his part<WH1571> also<WH1571> brought<WH935> of the firstlings<WH1060> of his flock<WH6629> and of their fat<WH2459> portions.<WH2459> And the Lord<WH3068> had<WH8159> regard<WH8159> for Abel<WH1893> and for his offering;<WH4503>
but for Cain<WH7014> and for his offering<WH4503> He had<WH8159> no<WH3808> regard.<WH8159> So Cain<WH7014> became<WH2734> very<WH3966> angry<WH2734> and his countenance<WH6440> fell.<WH5307>
Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Cain,<WH7014> "Why<WH4100> are you angry<WH2734>? And why<WH4100> has your countenance<WH6440> fallen<WH5307>?

"If<WH518> you do<WH3190> well,<WH3190> will not [your countenance] be lifted<WH7613> up? And if<WH518> you do not do<WH3190> well,<WH3190> sin<WH9128> is crouching<WH7257> at the door;<WH6607> and its desire<WH8669> is for you, but you must master<WH4910> it."

And Cain<WH7014> told<WH559> Abel<WH1893> his brother.<WH251> And it came<WH1961> about when they were in the field,<WH7704> that Cain<WH7014> rose<WH6965> up against<WH413> Abel<WH1893> his brother<WH251> and killed<WH2026> him.
Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Cain,<WH7014> "Where<WH335> is Abel<WH1893> your brother<WH251>?" And he said,<WH559> "I do not know.<WH3045> Am I my brother's keeper<WH8104>?"
And He said,<WH559> "What<WH4100> have you done<WH6213>? The voice<WH6963> of your brother's blood<WH1818> is crying<WH6817> to Me from the ground.<WH127>
"And now<WH6258> you are cursed<WH779> from the ground,<WH127> which<WH834> has opened<WH6475> its mouth<WH6310> to receive<WH3947> your brother's blood<WH1818> from your hand.<WH3027>

"When<WH3588> you cultivate<WH5647> the ground,<WH127> it shall no<WH3808> longer<WH3254> yield<WH5414> its strength<WH3581> to you; you shall be a vagrant<WH5128> and a wanderer<WH5110> on the earth.<WH776>"
And Cain<WH7014> said<WH559> to the Lord,<WH3068> "My punishment<WH5771> is too<WH4480> great<WH1419> to bear!<WH5375>

"Behold,<WH2005> Thou hast driven<WH1644> me this day<WH3117> from the face<WH6440> of the ground;<WH127> and from Thy face<WH6440> I shall be hidden,<WH5641> and I shall be a vagrant<WH5128> and a wanderer<WH5110> on the earth,<WH776> and it will come<WH1961> about that whoever<WH3605> finds<WH4672> me will kill<WH2026> me."

So the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to him, "Therefore<WH3651> whoever<WH3605> kills<WH2026> Cain,<WH7014> vengeance<WH5358> will be taken<WH5358> on him sevenfold.<WH7659>" And the Lord<WH3068> appointed<WH7760> a sign<WH226> for Cain,<WH7014> lest<WH1115> anyone<WH3605> finding<WH4672> him should slay<WH5221> him.
Then Cain<WH7014> went<WH3318> out from the presence<WH6440> of the Lord,<WH3068> and settled<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Nod,<WH5113> east<WH6926> of Eden.<WH5731>

And Cain<WH7014> had<WH3045> relations<WH3045> with his wife<WH802> and she conceived,<WH2029> and gave<WH3205> birth<WH3205> to Enoch;<WH2585> and he built<WH1129> a city,<WH5892> and called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of the city<WH5892> Enoch,<WH2585> after the name<WH8034> of his son.<WH1121>

Now to Enoch<WH2585> was born<WH3205> Irad;<WH5897> and Irad<WH5897> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Mehujael;<WH4232> and Mehujael<WH4232> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Methushael;<WH4967> and Methushael<WH4967> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Lamech.<WH3929>
And Lamech<WH3929> took<WH3947> to himself two<WH8147> wives:<WH802> the name<WH8034> of the one<WH259> was Adah,<WH5711> and the name<WH8034> of the other,<WH8145> Zillah.<WH6741>
And Adah<WH5711> gave<WH3205> birth<WH3205> to Jabal;<WH2989> he was the father of those who dwell<WH1> in tents<WH3427> and [have] livestock.<WH168>
And his brother's name<WH8034> was Jubal;<WH3106> he was the father of all<WH1> those who play<WH3605> the lyre<WH8610> and pipe.<WH3658>

As for Zillah,<WH6741> she also<WH1571> gave<WH3205> birth<WH3205> to Tubal-cain, the forger<WH3913> of all<WH3605> implements<WH9177> of bronze<WH5178> and iron;<WH1270> and the sister<WH269> of Tubal-cain was Naamah.<WH5279>

And Lamech<WH3929> said<WH559> to his wives,<WH802> "Adah<WH5711> and Zillah,<WH6741> Listen<WH8085> to my voice,<WH6963> You wives<WH802> of Lamech,<WH3929> Give<WH238> heed<WH238> to my speech,<WH565> For I have killed<WH2026> a man<WH376> for wounding<WH6482> me; And a boy<WH3206> for striking<WH2250> me;
If<WH3588> Cain<WH7014> is avenged<WH5358> sevenfold,<WH7659> Then Lamech<WH3929> seventy-sevenfold."

And Adam<WH121> had<WH3045> relations<WH3045> with his wife<WH802> again;<WH5750> and she gave<WH3205> birth<WH3205> to a son,<WH1121> and named<WH7121> <WH8034> him Seth,<WH8352> for, [she said,] "God<WH430> has appointed<WH7896> me another<WH312> offspring<WH2233> in place<WH8478> of Abel;<WH1893> for Cain<WH7014> killed<WH2026> him."

And to Seth,<WH8352> to him also<WH1571> a son<WH1121> was born;<WH3205> and he called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Enosh.<WH583> Then<WH227> [men] began<WH2490> to call<WH7121> upon the name<WH8034> of the Lord.<WH3068>
